## Vector3.Maximize() method

Gets the maximal coordinate values between two Vector3

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Maximize(left: Vector3, right: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  left | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the first operand |
|  right | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the second operand |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector3`

the new Vector3
